title: Bring back Art Spotlights?

embed.description: Play League of Legends FREE at http://signup.leagueoflegends.com/?ref=rumbleart

body: Used to love watching League's art spotlights :c why'd Riot stop? with all the new splashes and splash updates they look amazing personally, as a Shaco fanatic, I'd love to see Shaco's splashes being created and drawn. His design and everything I just love it!!!!
